item.description:
Date: Tuesday, May 14, 5:30 - 7 PM

Cost: Members- $15 in advance with $5 back at check in, Non-members- $15

RSVP by Sunday, May, 12th via our Meetup page or website

Topic: What to Expect When Expecting a Website

Speakers: Suzanne Larocque and Allison Biggs, Business Betties

http://businessbetties.com

Allison Biggs is graphic designer who is an excellent listener, thinks outside the box, and is an information sponge.
Suzanne Larocque is a lifestyle photographer. She's great at big-picture thinking, project management, and technical know-how.
Together, they are the Business Betties.

The Business Betties are two mavens on a mission to provide branding expertise and website project management to entrepreneurs who don't have the time or technical know-how to do this themselves. The goal of Business Betties is to save small businesses time, money, and frustration.

During this presentation you will learn what you should do before you begin your website project, the differences between developers and designers, and the unexpected costs of having a website.

 

Join us for:

• Seasonal and Signature Cocktails (alcoholic & non-alcoholic) and a huge array of tasty hors d'oeuvres

• Ample time for networking with a room full of women business owners

• A short presentation on a topic relevant to your business and your life

• Speed Networking facilitated by our members

• Raffles and door prizes

• An opportunity to shop with one of our vendors & connect with our sponsors

• This will be our LAST After 5 meeting until September 10th!
item.name: WBOA After 5: What to Expect When Expecting a Website
